task.title: How to Set-Up a Delivery Address (PLocation)
task.shortdesc: U Market Services strives to ensure that all packages are delivered to their correct destinations. To help us do so, be sure that your delivery address is correct by creating a PLocation Code for EACH LOCATION you plan to send orders to. Your PLocation Code is the unique number stored in EFS and with the U Market supplier. It references your shipping address in a specific format.

taskbody.context:
If you have any questions, please contact U Market Customer Support at 612-624-4878 or umarket@umn.edu.
DO NOT choose the option "Modify Location Codes" for U Market ordres. Doing so can create errors with the U Market supplier and cause delays in delivery.

steps.stepsection: To create a new PLocation Code, please follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download the EFS New Location Request Form.
Check the box labeled "New Location Code #."
Enter the Department ID the new PLocation will be used for. You may add as many PLocations to a department as needed.
Comply with the form's guidelines. The address must bear particular information on specific lines for deliveries to be routed correctly.

ul.li: Description: Used by the Requester to define address (e.g. Bob's Lab)
Line 2: Room and Buidling (e.g. RM 122 Civil Engineering B)
